IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE PENNINGTON SCHOOL IS AN INDEPENDENT CO-EDUCATIONAL SCHOOL SERVING DAY AND BOARDING STUDENTS IN GRADES 6-12. WE ARE DEDICATED TO DEVELOPING EXCELLENCE IN ALL STUDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PENNINGTON SCHOOL IS AN INDEPENDENT CO-EDUCATIONAL SCHOOL SERVING DAY AND BOARDING STUDENTS IN GRADES 6-12. THE SCHOOL IS DEDICATED TO DEVELOPING INDIVIDUAL EXCELLENCE IN ALL OF ITS STUDENTS.
IRS990.Desc: COEDUCATIONAL DAY/BOARDING SCHOOL SERVICING GRADES 6 THROUGH 12.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL HAS ADOPTED THE APPLICATION OF ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. THE SCHOOL HAD NO UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AT JUNE 30, 2016. IN ADDITION, THE SCHOOL HAS NO INCOME TAX RELATED PENALTIES OR INTEREST FOR THE PERIODS IN QUESTION. THE SCHOOL FILES A TAX RETURN IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION.
LOSS ON DISPOSAL OF ASSET.......... (279,444)
THE SCHOOL STATES ITS NON-DISCRIMINATORY POLICY ON ITS WEBSITE, MARKETING MATERIALS USED BY THE ADMISSION OFFICE, AND PRINT ADVERTISEMENTS THROUGH THE NATIONAL ASSOCATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SEE EXPLANATION FOR PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE WERE 126 RECIPIENTS (119 U.S. PERSONS) OF FINANCIAL AID AND 28 RECIPIENTS OF TUITION REMISSION. TUITION REMISSION IS AWARDED ON A NEED BASIS AND COVER THE COST OF A DAY TUITION. FINANCIAL AID IS AWARDED ON A NEED BASIS USING INDUSTRY STANDARD FINANCIAL DISCLOSURES AND CALCULATIONS.
WILLIAM HAWKEY WAS PROVIDED A SUPPLEMENTAL PENSION IN 2015-2016. THE COST WAS $7,750.
THE SCHOOL REQUIRES ALL BOARD OF TRUSTEES, OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES TO SIGN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES.

THE HEAD OF SCHOOL HAS BEEN IDENTIFIED AS AN OFFICER. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES MEETS TO DECIDE COMPENSATION. MEMBERS OF THE COMMITTEE ARE INDEPENDENT. A COMMITTEE MEMBER PREPARES COMPARABLE DATA FROM TAX RETURNS (USING GUIDESTAR) AND NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS (COLLECTED BY CFO). THIS MATERIAL IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE BOARD OF TRUSTESS RATIFIES COMMITTEE'S FINDINGS. ALL OTHER COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE HEADMASTER.
FORM 990 PREPARED BY INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANTS, REVIEWED BY FINANCE COMMITTEE AND PROVIDED TO INDIVIDUAL TRUSTEES EITHER BY EMAIL OR AT A BOARD MEETING PRIOR TO FILING.
THE SCHOOL'S FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE ON WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG. NO OTHER DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.

NET UNREALIZED GAINS ON INVESTMENTS FOR THE CURRENT FISCAL YEAR END INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING: UNREALIZED GAIN ON INVESTMENT .......................
